description: HTTP 500 indicates server encountered unexpected condition. Server-side error requiring retry logic.
solutions: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
Fall back to cached data if available
prevention: Use circuit breaker for fault tolerance
examples: suspend fun <T> retryWithBackoff(times: Int = 3, block: suspend () -> T): T { repeat(times - 1) { try { return block() } catch (e: HttpException) { if (e.code() >= 500) delay(1000 * 2.0.pow(it).toLong()) else throw e } }; return block() }
class CircuitBreaker { var state = CLOSED; fun call() { if (state == OPEN) throw CircuitOpenException() } }
